p: Results: In patients who developed liver injury the incidence of diarrhea (58 %) was higher than in control patients (22 %) p = 0.003, X2-test. Multivariate logistic regression analysis showed that diarrhea is an independent risk factor for the development of liver injury. (OR 4.1 (95 % CI 1.2-14.5), p = 0.028)
